headline: As U.S. companies return to Venezuela's oilfields — one Canadian driller has a head start
summary: Calgary's Ensign Energy Services has quietly kept rigs running in the volatile oil-rich nation for more than two decades

headline: Comstock Resources (CRK) – Among the Energy Stocks that Fell This Week
summary: The share price of Comstock Resources, Inc. (NYSE:CRK) fell by 9.12% between February 3 and February 10, 2026, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Lost the Most This Week. Comstock Resources, Inc. (NYSE:CRK) is a leading independent natural gas producer with operations focused on the development of the Haynesville shale in North Louisiana and East Texas. […]

headline: BKR Secures Gas Turbine Deal to Power U.S. Data Center Projects
summary: Baker Hughes wins deal to supply 10 gas turbines for U.S. data centers, generating up to 250 MW in a long-term partnership with Twenty20 Energy.

raw.headline: BKR Secures Gas Turbine Deal to Power U.S. Data Center Projects
raw.summary: Baker Hughes wins deal to supply 10 gas turbines for U.S. data centers, generating up to 250 MW in a long-term partnership with Twenty20 Energy.

headline: Assessing Baker Hughes (BKR) Valuation After New AI Data Center Turbine Order
summary: Baker Hughes (BKR) has drawn fresh attention after Twenty20 Energy awarded it a contract for 10 Frame 5 gas turbines for data center projects in Georgia and Texas, tied to growing AI power needs. See our latest analysis for Baker Hughes. The Twenty20 Energy order lands while Baker Hughes’ 1 month share price return of 27.74% and year to date gain of 29.93% suggest building momentum, alongside a 5 year total shareholder return of 193.13% that points to strong compounding over time. If AI...
